特定健康检查参与率越高，肾病患病率越低日本的一项新生态研究显示，都道府县特定健康检查的参与率（SHC 参与率）对都道府县特有的 ESKD 治疗标准发病率 (SIR) 和都道府县慢性肾病 (CKD) 患病率有显着的负面影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Higher-participation-in-Specific-Health-Checkups-linked-with-lower-prevalence-of-kidney-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Higher-participation-in-Specific-Health-Checkups- Associated-with-lower-prevalence-of-kidney-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3aefc18-b76a-4f21-a564-d2c32effdaa1 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 23:32:04 -0400 Higher participation in Specific Health Checkups associated with lower prevalence of kidney disease
研究发现男性焦虑或抑郁与体外受精结果之间没有联系体外受精 (IVF) 是一种耗时且常常会产生压力的生育过程。然而这种压力如何影响其成功呢？麻省总医院布莱根医疗保健系统的创始成员布莱根妇女医院的研究人员评估了男性焦虑和抑郁对生育和试管受精结果的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Study-finds-no-link- Between-anxiety-or-depression-and-IVF-outcomes-in-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Study-finds-no-link- Between-anxiety-or-depression-and-IVF-outcomes-in-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73b12044-0808-440a-8b38-d0f5e34125f9 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 23:27:33 -0400 Study finds no link between anxiety or depression and IVF outcomes in men
